backend/main.mo: Defines scenarios, user sessions, profiles, and access-controlled queries and updates for a conversation simulation backend.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature implementations with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels for the app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries of all frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with branding, login button, and settings link.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout including header, main content outlet, footer, and the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPanel.tsx: Displays an avatar whose mood changes with state and optionally shows a temporary speech bubble.
frontend/src/components/ChatComposer.tsx: Message input component with textarea, send button, and voice‑input integration.
frontend/src/components/ChatTranscript.t: Scrollable chat history with formatted timestamps and distinct AI/user message styling.
Renders an SVG line chart of confidence scores with axes, gridlines, and labels. Computes scaled points from score data and displays a fallback message when empty.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling. Clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/MetricsPanel.tsx: Displays confidence score, speaking metrics, and improvement tips with optional text-to-speech. Uses cards, progress bars, and icons for visualization.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Shows a modal prompting authenticated users without profiles to enter their name. Saves the profile and manages form state and submission.
Shows user progress stats, recent sessions, and authentication-dependent messaging. Provides navigation to session summaries.
frontend/src/components/QRCodeDisplay.ts: Generates a simple placeholder QR code on a canvas for a scenario deep link. Displays the link text below the canvas.
frontend/src/components/RetryResponseBut: A small outline button that triggers a retry action. Displays a rotate icon and supports disabling.
frontend/src/components/ScenarioCard.tsx: Renders a clickable scenario card with icon, title, and a QR code modal. Supports launching the scenario and showing its deep link QR.
frontend/src/components/VoiceInputButton: Provides a speech-to-text microphone button with listening states, error display, and transcript callback. Shows tooltip messaging and disables when unsupported.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, including anonymous fallback and admin token initialization. Invalidates related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversationSessio: Manages a conversation session lifecycle, handling messages, analysis, metrics, mood, and persistence with backend and local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Tracks user UI preferences with local storage persistence and exposes an update helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query for user profiles, scenarios, progress, sessions, and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements speech recognition handling, managing transcript, errors, and listening state.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Provides simple text‑to‑speech controls using the Web Speech API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/analysis.ts: Analyzes message content for confidence metrics, generates improvement tips, and produces canned AI responses.
frontend/src/lib/deeplinks.ts: Builds and parses scenario deep links using URL parameters.
frontend/src/lib/persistence.ts: Handles saving, loading, and clearing conversation sessions in localStorage, converting message timestamps between bigint and string.
frontend/src/lib/scenarios.ts: Defines available conversation scenarios and provides helpers to retrieve default or specific scenarios.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Renders the active conversation interface, managing messages, metrics, session flow, and scenario selection.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays scenario selection, quick start, and progress tracking, with URL-based scenario redirects.
frontend/src/pages/SessionSummaryPage.ts: Shows a session’s summary including metrics, charts, and transcript fetched by session ID.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI for adjusting theme, avatar type, and other user preferences.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the Social Confidence Simulator’s purpose, architecture, image requirements, and existing implemented features.
